item.title: 美元从高位回落，英镑在英国央行会议前受到挤压
item.description: 周四，美元维持在略低于数月高点的水平，对风险资产偏好的回升使美元脱离了近期的高点，而英镑则在英国央行会议前承压，投资者预计此次会议的基调将偏向鸽派。【原文：The dollar held just below multi-month highs on Thursday, with a recovery in appetite for riskier assets pulling it off recent peaks, while sterling was under pressure ahead of a Bank of England meeting where investors anticipate a dovish tone.】

item.title: 纽约小企业希望马姆达尼关注经济承受能力，而不是特朗普的剑拔弩张
item.description: 纽约市的酒馆、杂货店和餐馆的代表周三表示，他们希望纽约市当选市长佐兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）少花时间与唐纳德-特朗普总统过不去，而把重点放在他让这座城市更经济实惠的承诺上。【原文：Representatives of New York City's bodegas, grocers and restaurants said on Wednesday they hope New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani spends less time going after President Donald Trump and focuses on his promises to make the city more affordable.】

item.title: Downdetector 称，用户报告大幅下降，亚马逊从中断中恢复过来
item.description: 根据故障跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 的数据，亚马逊网站周三恢复了对美国大多数用户的服务。【原文：Amazon.com recovered for most users in the United States on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，嘉信理财接近完成 6 亿美元收购 Forge Global 的交易
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三报道，据两位熟悉相关条款的人士透露，嘉信理财有望宣布对私人股票市场 Forge Global 的收购交易，收购价高达 6 亿美元。【原文：Charles Schwab is expected to announce an acquisition deal for private share marketplace Forge Global in an offer valued at as much as $600 million, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, according to two people familiar with the terms.】

item.title: 曾与查理-贾维斯在弗兰克公司共事的高管因诈骗罪被判入狱 68 个月
item.description: 一名前财务主管因帮助查理-贾维斯（Charlie Javice）诈骗摩根大通以 1.75 亿美元收购大学财务援助初创公司 Frank 而被定罪，周三被判处 68 个月监禁。【原文：A former finance executive convicted of helping Charlie Javice defraud JPMorgan Chase into buying the college financial aid startup Frank for $175 million was sentenced on Wednesday to 68 months in prison.】

item.title: 大都会人寿投资收益带来季度利润增长
item.description: 大都会人寿保险公司（MetLife）周三报告称，该公司第三季度利润增长，因为该公司从投资中获得了更多收入。【原文：MetLife reported a rise in third-quarter profit on Wednesday, as the insurer raked in more income from investments.】

item.title: 在将查尔斯湖液化天然气项目的 80% 股份出售给权益合伙人之前，Energy Transfer 不会为该项目开绿灯
item.description: 美国管道运营商 Energy Transfer 公司高管周三在财报后的电话会议上表示，在将该项目 80% 的股份出售给权益合伙人之前，公司不会在财务上批准其位于路易斯安那州的查尔斯湖液化天然气出口设施。【原文：U.S. pipeline operator Energy Transfer will not give its Lake Charles liquefied natural gas export facility in Louisiana a financial go ahead until 80% of the project has been sold to equity partners, company executives said on Wednesday on a post-earnings call.】

item.title: 摩科瑞、劳力士等瑞士企业高管与特朗普会面
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份声明，地中海航运公司（MSC）、劳力士（Rolex）、伙伴集团（Partners Group）、摩古利雅（Mercuria）、历峰集团（Richemont）和 MKS 的高管参加了周二在椭圆形办公室与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普举行的瑞士商界领袖会议。【原文：Executives of MSC, Rolex, Partners Group , Mercuria, Richemont and MKS took part in a meeting of Swiss business leaders with U.S. President Donald Trump in the Oval Office on Tuesday, according to a statement seen by Reuters.】

item.title: Citadel 首席执行官格里芬说，纽约市人民应该得到比马姆达尼的言论更好的待遇
item.description: Citadel 公司首席执行官肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）周三表示，他祈祷当选市长佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）用来领导纽约市的政策与他的谈话要点有所不同。【原文：Ken Griffin, the CEO of Citadel, said on Wednesday he prays the policies that Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani uses to lead New York City are different from his talking points.】

item.title: 特殊药品需求强劲，麦凯森上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 周三，药品分销商麦凯森（McKesson）上调了 2026 财年的利润预期，看好其肿瘤学和特殊药品分销业务的强劲增长。【原文：Drug distributor McKesson raised its fiscal 2026 profit forecast on Wednesday, betting on strong growth in its oncology and specialty drug distribution businesses.】

item.title: Nutrien 盈利超出预期，开始审查磷酸盐业务
item.description: Nutrien 周三公布的第三季度利润超出分析师预期，并表示将启动磷酸盐业务战略备选方案审查。【原文：Nutrien beat analysts' expectations for third-quarter profit on Wednesday, and said it would initiate a review of strategic alternatives for its phosphate business.】

item.title: 摩根大通在底特律的投资为美国其他城市的计划树立了典范
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）周三在底特律接受采访时表示，摩根大通在过去 11 年中已在底特律投资 20 亿美元，以帮助降低失业率和促进经济增长。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has invested $2 billion during the past 11 years in Detroit to help reduce unemployment and boost growth, CEO Jamie Dimon said in an interview in the city on Wednesday, and the bank plans to roll out the model in other U.S. cities.】

item.title: Freshworks 预计第四季度收入将因人工智能驱动的软件需求而强劲增长
item.description: Freshworks 公司周三预测第四季度营收将高于华尔街预期，押注于人工智能软件工具需求的增长。【原文：Freshworks forecast fourth-quarter revenue above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, betting on growing demand for its artificial intelligence-powered software tools.】

item.title: 美联储敲定修订后的大银行评级标准
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会（U.S. Federal Reserve）周三宣布，它已完成了对大型银行评级框架的修订，这将使银行更容易保持合格等级。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve announced on Wednesday it had finalized a revised framework for how it grades large banks, which will make it easier for firms to maintain a passing grade.】

item.title: 交易日：美国经济复苏提振精神
item.description: 周三，美国股市和债券收益率上涨，原因是就业增长和服务业数据出人意料地强劲，这表明经济状况良好，并使人们对美联储需要将利率下调多少产生了疑问。【原文：U.S. stocks and bond yields rose on Wednesday on surprisingly strong job growth and service sector data, which suggests the economy is in decent shape and calls into question how much lower the Federal Reserve needs to cut interest rates.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，辉瑞准备提高对美素佳儿的收购价
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，辉瑞公司正准备再次提高对美塞拉公司的报价。【原文：Pfizer is preparing to sweeten its offer again for Metsera , the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 票价上涨，边疆公司预计季度利润将好于预期
item.description: 美国低成本航空公司边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的母公司边疆集团控股公司（Frontier Group Holdings）周三预计，受机票价格上涨的影响，第四季度利润将好于预期。【原文：Frontier Group Holdings , parent of U.S. low-cost carrier Frontier Airlines, forecast better-than-expected fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by improving air fares.】

item.title: 票房强劲，AMC 季度收入超出预期
item.description: 连锁影院 AMC Entertainment 周三公布的第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，这主要得益于包括《超人》和《咒怨》在内的大片阵容强大：最后的仪式【原文：Theater chain AMC Entertainment beat Wall Street expectations for third-quarter revenue on Wednesday, bolstered by a strong lineup of blockbusters including "Superman" and "The Conjuring: Last Rites."】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：英伟达黄仁勋："中国将赢得人工智能竞赛
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周三报道，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋警告说，中国将在人工智能竞赛中击败美国。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang has warned that China will beat the United States in the artificial intelligence race, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 随着越来越多的客户转向数字银行，Chime 上调了 2025 年收入展望
item.description: 由于对数字银行服务的需求持续增长，Chime 周三上调了全年营收预期，高于华尔街预期，股价在延时交易中上涨了 4%。【原文：Chime raised its full-year revenue forecast above Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, as demand for its digital banking services kept growing, sending shares up 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: Snap 因广告增长和 Perplexity AI 交易而收入超过预期，股价大涨
item.description: Snap周三公布的第三季度营收超出预期，并表示已与Perplexity AI公司合作，将其人工智能搜索引擎整合到Snapchat中。【原文：Snap beat third-quarter revenue estimate on Wednesday and said it has partnered with Perplexity AI to integrate its artificial intelligence-powered search engine into Snapchat, sending the social media firm's shares surging around 23% after the bell.】

item.title: 独家报道美国将在停航期间削减 40 个机场 10%的空中运输量
item.description: 美国交通部长肖恩-达菲（Sean Duffy）周三证实，除非达成结束联邦政府停摆的协议，否则他将下令从周五开始将40个主要机场的定期航班量减少10%。【原文：U.S. Transportation Secretary Sean Duffy confirmed on Wednesday that he would order a 10% reduction in scheduled air traffic at 40 major airports starting Friday unless a deal to end the federal government shutdown is reached.】

item.title: 设计软件需求强劲，Figma 上调年度收入预期
item.description: Figma 周三上调了年度营收预期，这主要得益于这家协作设计软件供应商在扩大产品阵容和增加用户群方面所做的努力，从而使其股价在盘后交易中上涨了 4%。【原文：Figma raised its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday, banking on the collaborative design software provider's efforts to expand its product line-up and grow its user base, sending its shares up 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 零售交易商乘势入市，Robinhood 利润飙升
item.description: Robinhood Markets 周三表示，由于散户投资者在人工智能推动的涨势中提高了交易量，该公司的季度利润增长了近四倍，并宣布其长期财务主管退休。【原文：Robinhood Markets said on Wednesday its quarterly profit had nearly quadrupled as retail investors boosted trading volumes amid an AI-fueled rally, and announced the retirement of its longtime finance chief.】

item.title: DoorDash 季度利润不及预期，股价下跌
item.description: 本周三，DoorDash 的第三季度利润未能达到华尔街的预期，因为这家外卖公司正努力应对不断增长的支出。【原文：DoorDash missed Wall Street estimates for third quarter profit on Wednesday as the delivery firm grappled with rising expenses.】

item.title: 人工智能助力 Arm Holdings 第三季度业绩超出预期
item.description: 受人工智能计算蓬勃发展的推动，芯片技术供应商Arm Holdings周三发布的第三财季业绩预期超出华尔街预期。【原文：Chip technology provider Arm Holdings , gave a fiscal third-quarter forecast on Wednesday that topped Wall Street's expectations, boosted by the boom in artificial intelligence computing.】

item.title: Duolingo 称人工智能功能 "有利可图"，营收超预期并上调业绩预期
item.description: 本周三，Duolingo 公司第三季度营收超出华尔街预期，并上调了全年营收预期，原因是这款语言学习应用吸引了更多付费用户使用其人工智能驱动的层级。【原文：Duolingo Inc beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter revenue and raised its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday, as the language-learning app attracted more paying subscribers for its AI-powered tier.】

item.title: 智能手机需求反弹，高通公司第四季度业绩预计高于预期
item.description: 受智能手机行业终端市场需求回升的推动，高通公司周三预计第一财季销售额和利润均高于华尔街预期。【原文：Qualcomm on Wednesday forecast fiscal first-quarter sales and profit above Wall Street expectations, powered by a renewal of end-market demand in the smartphone industry.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，金融软件供应商 OneStream 在股价下跌后寻求出售
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的人士透露，金融软件制造商 OneStream 正在探索战略选择，包括可能的出售。【原文：Financial software maker OneStream is exploring strategic options including a possible sale, less than 18 months after its stock market debut, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官称美联储可能保持独立
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）周三对路透社表示，他相信美国联邦储备委员会将继续保持独立。【原文：JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon said on Wednesday he believes the U.S. Federal Reserve will continue to be independent, the top executive of the biggest U.S. bank told Reuters.】
